Title: 3. News Media
Write-Up Text: The people have spoken and the Australian government has listened! They are making moves to address the country's financial deficits and imbalances by investing heavily in the healthcare sector even as they try to reduce expenses through necessary tax hikes. However some fears in the industry include unsurety over the extension of the instant asset write-off and the lack of a pledge to continue funding the critical heart health checks. But the government has also promised to strengthen workers' retirement security by introducing new measures that tackle unpaid superannuation payments.
